description: Steve Bruce's latest return to St Andrew's ends in stalemate as League One leaders Birmingham City are held to a goalless draw by Blackpool.
title: League One: Birmingham City 0-0 Blackpool
title_page: League One: Birmingham City 0-0 Blackpool - BBC Sport
maintext:
Birmingham City have failed to win any of their last three league games against Blackpool (D1 L2), with one of those losses coming in the form of a 6-1 defeat in April 2022.
Blackpool have won just one of their last seven away league games against Birmingham City (D2 L4), failing to score in four of those matches and never scoring more than once during that time.
Birmingham have failed to win their final league game of the year in each of their last six seasons (D2 L4) since a 1-0 home win over Leeds United in 2017.
